courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: A complete course for beginners to learn chords, strumming patterns, and play popular songs on the guitar.

courses.title: Piano for All Levels
courses.description: Learn piano from the basics to advanced level with sheet music, ear training, and improvisation techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand scales, chords, harmony, and rhythm to improve your music composition and performance.

courses.title: Vocal Training and Singing
courses.description: Develop your vocal range, breathing techniques, and confidence in singing across multiple genres.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to produce EDM, Hip-Hop, and Lo-Fi beats using professional DAWs and plugins.
